<title level="1" right="Spell 3" pfs="Standard">[Remove Disease](/Spells.aspx?ID=251)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Healing" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=89" />
<trait label="Necromancy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=117" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 363 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Traditions**
[Divine](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=2), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>

<row>10 minutes ([material](/Rules.aspx?ID=282), [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284))</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** touch

**Target** 1 creature
</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

Healing magic purges disease from a creature's body. You attempt to counteract one disease afflicting the target.
